trans-unit.source: Performs data binding of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> Web server control within a visual designer.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class performs design-time data binding of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类执行的设计时数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> method performs the design-time data binding.
This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first one demonstrates how to derive a control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control and associate it with its data binding handler.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示如何派生控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控件并将其与其数据绑定处理程序关联。

trans-unit.source: The second one demonstrates how to the derive a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何从类派生<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to derive the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control, and then apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> attribute to associate the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control with its data binding handler, the `SimpleRadioButtonListDataBindingHandler` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从`SimpleRadioButtonList`控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制，然后再应用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>特性将相关联`SimpleRadioButtonList`具有其数据绑定处理程序中，控件`SimpleRadioButtonListDataBindingHandler`类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to derive the `SimpleRadioButtonListDataBindingHandler` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从`SimpleRadioButtonListDataBindingHandler`类<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类。

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> method to add a message to the associated `SimpleRadioButtonList` control when that control is data bound.
trans-unit.target: 它将重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>方法添加到关联的消息`SimpleRadioButtonList`控制该控件时被数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler" /> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类引用类时<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> for the document that contains the control.
Performs data binding on the specified control.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control that is specified by `control` has a data source specified within its <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, and then adds a string message indicating that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> is data bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>由指定的控件`control`具有数据源中指定其<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>方法清除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>，然后添加一个字符串消息指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>数据绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> method to add a string message to the associated `SimpleRadioButtonList` control when that control is data bound.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>方法添加到关联的字符串消息`SimpleRadioButtonList`控制该控件时被数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类。
